name: CONTAINERS
description:
Take control of the port ! Arrange the containers as you please to answer the demands of your clients! Survive all week and you'll get the job !

Controls:
-Drag and drop for moving the containers
-E for showing the planning

This is just a small, janky, pretty awful game I made as a challenge. I'm trying to make one game every week, and I guess this is the first one. Hopefully I'll be prouder of the next ones, just like with my kids !
